alert.note: Alert for Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Ynez Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 08 at 9:40AM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 tonight and early Tuesday morning expected. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast, Santa Ynez Valley, Lake Casitas and Ojai Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be frosted.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Ynez Valley
